wikipedia_page.main: John Syer Bristowe (1827–1895) was an English physician.

response: Bristowe was the third son of John Syer Bristowe, a doctor of Camberwell, and his wife Mary Chesshyre of Rock Savage, Cheshire. He was educated privately and became a stockbroker. He was a partner in the firm of Bristowe Brothers of the London Stock Exchange.Debretts Guide to the House of Commons 1886
